Friday.title: Setup begins
Friday.description: VTHacks staff will begin setting up everything inside the venue. Please come check-in first and come help us out if you're free!

Friday.title: Volunteer Check-in
Friday.description: If you're a volunteer, please check in at the main entrace of Cassell Coliseum.

Friday.title: Sponsor Check in
Friday.description: If you're a sponsor, you can check-in at the main entrance of Cassel Coliseum. Sponsors can now also set up tables.

Friday.title: General Check-in
Friday.description: Everyone can now check-in at the main entrance of Cassel Coliseum.

Friday.title: Dinner
Friday.description: We will now begin serving dinner!

Friday.title: Opening Ceremony
Friday.description: The opening ceremony will now begin. Head over to the stands.

Friday.title: Hacking Starts
Friday.description: You can now officially start to work on your projects. Best of luck!

Friday.title: CapTech Tech Talk
Friday.description: The Tech Talk by CapTech will now begin. It will last approximately 30 minutes.

Friday.title: TechPad Tech Talk
Friday.description: The Tech Talk by Tech Pad will now begin. It will last approximately 1 hour.

Saturday.title: Midnight Snack
Saturday.description: Campus Cookies will be providing us with a delicious midnight snack.

Saturday.title: Breakfast
Saturday.description: Breakfast provided by Carol Lee Doughnuts + Starbucks - Get ready to try the best doughnuts on campus.

Saturday.title: Lunch
Saturday.description: Lunch will be provided by Chinese Kitchen.

Saturday.title: Dinner
Saturday.description: Dinner will be provided by Bennys.

Sunday.title: Midnight Snack
Sunday.description: Get ready for a delicious snack provided by our friends at Frosty Parrot!

Sunday.title: Coffee
Sunday.description: Starbucks coffee to wrap up the last lap of the hackathon!

Sunday.title: Expo
Sunday.description: We will now begin our Expo in the Bowl. Prepare to show off your hacks!

Sunday.title: Lunch
Sunday.description: Lunch will be provided by Next Door Bake Shop.

Sunday.title: Closing Ceremony
Sunday.description: Head over to the Bowl for our Closing Ceremony.
